body_html:
i'm using cuda 9.1 and cudnn 7.1.13 with tensorflow 1.5.0 building from the source ,my laptop configuration i5 4200h 8go ram and gtx950m , and it work for me,
to build use Bazel and gcc 4.8 g++ 4.8

body:
i'm using _cuda 9.1_ and _cudnn 7.1.13_ with _tensorflow 1.5.0_ building from the source ,my laptop configuration i5 4200h 8go ram and gtx950m , and it work for me,
to build use Bazel and gcc 4.8 g++ 4.8
